cs63

Class SolitaireWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • cs63.SolitaireWorld

  • public class SolitaireWorld
extends World
    A world for playing Aces-Up Solitaire. This class can be adapted easily to other Solitaire games.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • dealCardsToEachPile

        public void dealCardsToEachPile()
        Deals a single card face-up to each Pile. The caller must ensure that at least one card remains in the deck when the method is called, as this will throw an exception if no cards remain when it is called. If the deck runs out of cards after the first one has been dealt, the deck will be removed from the world and the method will return, possibly before all piles have received a card.
